name: likeZEBRA
tag_list: music, music-discover, unsigned-music, unsigned-bands, unsigned-artists, independent-music, independent-artists, independent-bands, bands, streaming-music
overview: likeZEBRA is the premier site for fans and artists to connect. We equip musicians with the tools they need to increase their audience and pursue their passions. Music lovers benefit from this by discovering new artists and expanding their tastes while networking with their current favorites. By utilizing likeZEBRA, bands and solo performers can showcase their music and achieve success in new and exciting ways. A suite of promotional devices will enable artists to contact their fans, create physical content and monitor their rise of popularity on the site. Fans can enjoy a more personal approach to their experience by directly uniting with their favorite musicians on the site. likeZEBRA users are able to share discoveries with friends, stay up-to-date on the latest industry news and simply focus on enjoying music. The music industry is constantly changing and likeZEBRA keeps a finger on the pulse to cater to the needs of both the artist and the fan.
